p: The health and well-being of the globe requires a safe and effective Zika vaccine. For couples of childbearing age desiring to have children, the prospect of Zika infection is terrifying. Maternal infections can and do lead to a spectrum of congenital consequences—some of which are severe and much of which is yet to be fully unraveled. The global community must pay attention and remain undeterred by the tyranny of the next urgency that detracts attention away from the goal of a vaccine. It is not simply an infection “over there”—this is a global issue that requires a global solution. The future and health of the most vulnerable among us—the yet unborn—depends on our efforts.
